column6:
New series artist Salvador Larroca arrives-as Apocalypse begins! Sinister has been resurrected, the pieces are moving into place, and everything is starting to come together. Can the X-Men prevent the coming of Apocalypse? The story arc that's been building for a year kicks off here!,2008,1
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
